titles.title: Administrative Law Process Enhancement Act of 2002
To amend the Social Security Act to establish an Office of Administrative Law Judges in the Social Security Administration.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 6/13/2002--Introduced. Administrative Law Process Enhancement Act of 2002 - Amends title VII (Administration) of the Social Security Act to establish an Office of Administrative Law Judges in the Social Security Administration.
